Hello

If you see our advertisement then yes the apartment is available

and in order to pre qualify you for this apartment  Please provide some
additional information about yourself

This is a great apartment as well as the location which is central and very
convenient to public transportation, shopping and commute

Very spacious  apartment/ very sunny.



-Name______________ occupation_______________________
salary__________________________

- how many people will live with you?______________________________

- when are you looking to move in ?_________________

- what is your salary?____________________   Other
income____________________

- how many apartments have you viewed so far?_______________________________



if you plan to share the apartment with a room mate please write about all
potential occupants in details...



*please respond as soon as you can so we can schedule you for the next
sawing*
Best

Good Afternoon Alejandro,

  Apt is available.... Answer the questions below to make your apt. process go quicker & smoother.  Also leave a direct contact number so I can give you more info & we can set up a viewing time.

6. Hows your credit?

8. Full Name?


Talk to you soon.

Thank You

Luis 
646-732-4528

 Village!!!" on Craigslist

Body:
Thank you for contacting me.   I am out of the office returning Monday, November 13 at 9 a.m.

Jose Velazquez(jose@lhapts.com) may be reached for questions regarding a lease or application currently in process.  The NYC leasing office may also be reached by calling 646-559-0251.

If you are a resident and in need of immediate assistance regarding your apartment, please try and reach out to your super or Property Manager.  Their information is posted in the lobby/vestibule area by the mailboxes.  Please check that area for the best contact or try reaching out to the leasing office at 646-559-0251.

Thank you,
Kelly Greer
CoSo Portfolio Coordinator.

Body:
Hey Bernie, thanks for reaching out! My name is Tyler, I am the manager of this building as well as a couple of others in the area and I'd love to help! Since you reached out to me directly, there is no broker fee! I am available to show you guys pretty much at any time. 

Just a couple of questions if possible:
How many roommates are you?
What are your credit scores and the combined annual income?

Please feel free to text me at (516) 784-0478. Thanks! 

Sent from my iPhone

Subject: Re: Your listing "Spacious 2 bed 1 bath ASAP!" on Craigslist

Body:
Thank you for contacting me, I am happy to arrange a showing for tomorrow
late afternoon or early evening.

Please let me know if you meet the following requirements -

*All applicants* must have 2015 and 2016 tax returns plus W2's, current
employment letters verifying salary and status, recent 6 consecutive pay
stubs and recent 6 consecutive bank statements, good credit is a must.

For these stabilized apartment, the minimum household income to qualify is
$82K, but cannot exceed the maximum of  $126k for household of two people,
or $146K maximum for household of three people.

Please let me know if you qualify and interested in seeing the apt.

<https://www.avast.com/sig-email?utm_medium=email&utm_source=link&utm_campaign=sig-email&utm_content=webmail&utm_term=icon>

Subject: Bernie, welcome to your new Google Account

Body:
Watch a video to quickly learn how to make the most of your new Inbox.

[image: Inbox by Gmail] <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VCo3zZ0P4vU>
Where can I use Inbox?

Inbox works best if you use it everywhere you check your email. Inbox is
available on the web at inbox.google.com, on Google Play and on the App
Store.
[image: Play Store]
<https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.inbox&referrer=utm_source%3Demail_welcome>[image:
App Store]
<https://itunes.apple.com/app/apple-store/id905060486?pt=9008&ct=web_mrkt&mt=8>
How do I add a Reminder?

Tap the red create button in the bottom right and then tap the blue
Reminder icon.
Can I still use Inbox & Gmail?

Of course. All of your email is still in Gmail and always will be, but
Inbox works best if you go all in.
Can I file feedback?

Yes, please. Open the menu and scroll to the bottom of your labels. Tap
“Help & Feedback” and let us know what you think. If you’re interested in
giving in-person feedback, sign-up to be interviewed
<http://www.google.com/usability/index.html?reserved=0&pType=0&productTag=gmai_inbx&campaignType=gem&campaignDate=may15&labelTag=0>
in future user studies.
Is Inbox going to replace Gmail?

Don’t worry, Gmail isn’t going anywhere. Inbox is a new experience designed
and developed alongside Gmail.
Where can I learn more?

Check out our Help Center <https://support.google.com/inbox/?p=welcome> to
learn more about specific features.

Cheers,

The Gmail Team

© 2017 Google Inc

1600 Amphitheatre Parkway

Mountain View, CA 94043

Body:
Hello Alejandro,

Thank you for your interest, in fact the building just lowered the prices
since I posted this ad.  During the winter months they will
increase concessions to get the occupancy up.  This is a No Broker Fee
luxury rental and they are offering 1 Month FREE. The building is very
flexible, they require the tenant to make 40X the rent and have good
credit.

Gross rent is $5,750 with the One Free month it nets to $4,792.

Can you tell me the below?

What is your current situation?
Where do you live now?
Where are you focusing your search?
When is your move in date?
Do you have any pets?
What price point would you like to stay below?

I'll look forward to hearing from you soon!  Are your free for a scheduled
viewing for Today at 5 PM?  Let me know when works for you

Subject:
Re: Your listing "GORGEOUS 2BDR Murray Hill/Elevator/Laundry/CITY
 VIEWS *NO FEE*" on Craigslist

Body:
Thanks for reaching out!


To speak with the leasing manager please call or text Brett at (516)
816-2848 - For answers to commonly asked questions and additional details
about the apartment please read below. We also highly recommend you watch
the video tour via the youtube link in the listing sheet and to send the
link to your potential roommates.


Please click the following link for up-to-date information and a youtube
link for the video tour. CLICK HERE: Listing Sheet Updated Live
<https://docs.google.com/document/d/1KssvJY6poVzqwTBf2SVrwPBWg4kioy5imnjZKtbovPY/edit?usp=sharing>


1) Requirements are flexible but we are generally looking for NYC standard
of 650+ credit score and annual income of 40X the monthly rent for all
applicants combined. There is room for flexibility as co-signers or
additional months security deposit are accepted. Programs are accepted as
well.


2) To schedule a showing: Call or text Brett at (516) 816-2848. Saturday we
are closed; but please leave a voicemail or send a text to Brett at (516)
816-2848 and I will get back to you by Sunday morning 9AM.


3) Payments due at signing are first month rent, one month security, and
any applicable fees. Utilities included for all units are heat and hot
water. Electric and internet are separate.


We look forward to working with you,

Arden Realty

Subject:
Re: Your listing "@LUXURY-BUILDING@ *24H-DOORMAN* ^GYM^ BRIGHT
 &NO FEE&" on Craigslist

Body:
Hi Bernard,

Thank you very much for responding to my listing.

So that I may better serve you and get you the best unit, please provide me
with your current contact information of email and best phone/text.

Also, please answer the following -

When is your move in date?
Will the unit be just for you and your wife?
Are you looking for true bedrooms or are you open to a convertible?
What is your overall budget you're trying to stay under?

In your email to me, you asked when i am available to schedule a viewing.
I am very flexible.  It can be anytime.  Let me know your availability and
I will work around your schedule.

What about today or evening?

Best,
Beth
bmadaras.luxuryrentals@gmail.com
917-828-1576 phone, vm, and text

Body:
Watch a video to quickly learn how to make the most of your new Inbox.

[image: Inbox by Gmail] <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VCo3zZ0P4vU>
Where can I use Inbox?

Inbox works best if you use it everywhere you check your email. Inbox is
available on the web at inbox.google.com, on Google Play and on the App
Store.
[image: Play Store]
<https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.google.android.apps.inbox&referrer=utm_source%3Demail_welcome>[image:
App Store]
<https://itunes.apple.com/app/apple-store/id905060486?pt=9008&ct=web_mrkt&mt=8>
How do I add a Reminder?

Tap the red create button in the bottom right and then tap the blue
Reminder icon.
Can I still use Inbox & Gmail?

Of course. All of your email is still in Gmail and always will be, but
Inbox works best if you go all in.
Can I file feedback?

Yes, please. Open the menu and scroll to the bottom of your labels. Tap
“Help & Feedback” and let us know what you think. If you’re interested in
giving in-person feedback, sign-up to be interviewed
<http://www.google.com/usability/index.html?reserved=0&pType=0&productTag=gmai_inbx&campaignType=gem&campaignDate=may15&labelTag=0>
in future user studies.
Is Inbox going to replace Gmail?

Don’t worry, Gmail isn’t going anywhere. Inbox is a new experience designed
and developed alongside Gmail.
Where can I learn more?

Check out our Help Center <https://support.google.com/inbox/?p=welcome> to
learn more about specific features.

Cheers,

The Gmail Team

© 2017 Google Inc

1600 Amphitheatre Parkway

Mountain View, CA 94043
Subject: Welcome to Inbox by Gmail
